# TruffleHog Excluded Paths
# Automatically generated directories that may contain false positives
node_modules/
.git/
dist/
build/
.firebase/
.vscode/
.idea/

# Log files and temporary files
*.log
*.tmp
*.temp
coverage/
test-results/
playwright-report/

# Configuration examples (not actual secrets)
.env.example
config.example.js
firebase.example.json

# Large data files that may trigger false positives
data/
*.pdf
*.zip
*.tar.gz

# Dependencies and build artifacts
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyo
